headline: Devon Energy (DVN) Q4 2025 Earnings Transcript
summary: Today, we will focus on Devon Energy Corporation’s strong fourth quarter and full year 2025 results.  Before diving into those very impressive results, I also want to cover the highlights of our recently announced merger with Cotera Energy.  The combination of these two outstanding companies creates a clear path to superior value creation that neither company could achieve independently.

headline: Devon Q4 Earnings & Revenues Beat Estimates, Production Increases
summary: DVN's beats Q4 earnings and revenue estimates as production tops guidance and costs fall, even as oil prices slide year over year.

headline: Devon Energy Coterra All Stock Merger Reshapes Shale Scale And Returns
summary: Devon Energy (NYSE:DVN) has agreed to an all stock merger with Coterra Energy. The combined company will keep the Devon Energy name, with Devon as the surviving entity. The deal represents a major consolidation move in the U.S. shale sector. For you as an investor, this merger is a notable development in the oil and gas space, where scale and capital discipline have become key themes. Devon Energy, known for its shale operations, is set to absorb Coterra's assets, creating a larger producer...

headline: Devon Energy (DVN) Reports Q4 Earnings: What Key Metrics Have to Say
summary: While the top- and bottom-line numbers for Devon Energy (DVN) give a sense of how the business performed in the quarter ended December 2025, it could be worth looking at how some of its key metrics compare to Wall Street estimates and year-ago values.
